model_info.name: Heart Sound Classification Model
model_info.description: TensorFlow Lite model for classifying heart sounds into normal, murmur, and extrasystole categories

input_spec.description: Mel-spectrogram features (64 mel bands, 87 time frames)
input_spec.preprocessing: mel-spectrogram with 8kHz sample rate, 512 FFT, 256 hop length

output_spec.description: Probability distribution over 2 heart sound classes (binary classification)

training_info.dataset: Combined heart sound datasets (PhysioNet, PASCAL, custom)

clinical_validation.notes: Model requires clinical validation before medical use
